column2: when you rank this place against other BBQ places in Chi? Its for sure top 5. Which is a small pool to draw from
column4: I thought Smalls topped this place
column5: followed by Dino's just on selection. Never mind the unnecessarily intimidating ordering process. Which is like
column6: what? It made me feel awkward
column7: I don't know why. Also the layout of the restaurant is pretty bad. I also was with 2 children
column8: but it just was overall just OK to me.
